description: Eve and Blade force Cruz to do their shopping, but Eve has to drag him out again to get it right. While searching for the elusive Super Gel Dero Doro beverage, they run into Uten, one of Simeon`s four strongest members. "It`s magic!", or is it? What is the nature of Uten`s Needless ability, and just how immodest can Eve`s uniform get before this anime gets re-rated? Burning questions, dubious answers - they`re all here.

titles.title: イヴ・ノイシュヴァンシュタイン
